name: But What Will People Say?
description:
But What Will People Say? is a two player visual novel where one player plays Aashi, a North Indian girl dealing with colorism, and the other player plays as CJ, a Filipino American boy recovering from an eating disorder, as they meet and grow closer over the span of a single day. 

Huge thanks to Huy for dealing with my stupidity and helping me program!

Gorgeous art done by @pickledchisps! Follow her on Twitter!

Music by Malia Mohrman!
